Detailed Description

The FacadeObserver abstract base class defines the interface for receiving notifications from the Facade.

To implement an observer, subclass FacadeObserver and override the pure virtual member functions.

To add an observer, invoke the Facade::addObserver() method. To remove an observer, invoke the Facade::removeObserver() method.

Warning
Do not call Facade::addObserver() or Facade::removeObserver() from within a notification handler.
See Also
Facade class

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Chronicle::FacadeObserver::capturePaused ( )
pure virtual

Notification that the current capture is now paused.

Warning
This notification handler is usually invoked in a separate worker thread. You are responsible for implementing measures to ensure thread safety.
virtual void Chronicle::FacadeObserver::captureResumed ( )
pure virtual

Notification that the current capture (that was paused) has now resumed.

Warning
This notification handler is usually invoked in a separate worker thread. You are responsible for implementing measures to ensure thread safety.

pure virtual

Notification that a new capture has started.

Warning
This notification handler is usually invoked in a separate worker thread. You are responsible for implementing measures to ensure thread safety.

pure virtual

Notification that the capture in progess has now stopped.

Warning
This notification handler is usually invoked in a separate worker thread. You are responsible for implementing measures to ensure thread safety.
